methods.description:
Get a simple description for this AggSpec.

:return: (java.lang.String) The description
methods.walk:
Glue method to deliver this AggSpec to a AggSpec.Visitor.

Note: Java generics information - <V extends io.deephaven.api.agg.spec.AggSpec.Visitor>

:param visitor: (V) - The visitor
:return: (V) The visitor
methods.weight:
Column name for the source of input weights.

:return: (io.deephaven.api.ColumnName) The weight column name

text:
Specifies an aggregation that outputs the average (arithmetic mean) of the input column values weighted by the
 weight column values for each group. Only works for numeric input types.
